property.name: install.dir
property.description: Local dir where to install component. incubator-zeppelin folder will be created as a subdir of this dir e.g. /root/incubator-zeppelin

property.name: stack.port
property.description: Port on which component will run. The subsequent port (e.g. 9996) should also be open as it will be used by the web socket

property.name: stack.dir
property.description: Stack dir from where to run setup/start/stop scripts

property.name: mvn.dir
property.description: Location of mvn executable (e.g. /usr/bin/mvn). Maven must be installed prior to setting up Zeppelin
